subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Even as he was accepting the Laureus World Sportsman of the Year award in Toronto on Wednesday, Usain Bolt said he has kept an eye on the comeback of the American sprinter Tyson Gay.
snippet: Even as he was accepting the Laureus World Sportsman of the Year award in Toronto on Wednesday, Usain Bolt said he has kept an eye on the comeback of the American sprinter Tyson Gay.
